item.title: Vengeance.. again
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

public void StrengthMagic(String s) { if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("RaiseStr")) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 96) if(RaiseStr == 0) { txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; startAnimation(1979); playerLevel[2] += 25; Str3 = true; strPot = true; stillgfx(401, absX, absY); RaiseStr = 100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (playerLevel[6] <= 96) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 96 to cast Vengeance."); } }

Ok my problem with vengeance now is it only updates the strength level until after i make an action like trading, attacking, etc. Anything will help.

Read full topic
